verses.verse: Now <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%>

and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and out, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> for it <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet;<s%> even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of it.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And he <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>wide.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold;<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> them of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work,<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat;<s%>

<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H7098>end,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H7098>end;<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> [of one piece] with the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends.<s%>

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> [their] <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H4605>upward,<s%> <S%H5526>covering<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H251>other;<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> two <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H7341>wide<s%> and one and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high.<s%>
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> for it <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4526>rim<s%> for it of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> for its <S%H4526>rim<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that were on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
<S%H5980>Close<s%> by the <S%H4526>rim<s%> were the <S%H2885>rings,<s%> the <S%H1004>holders<s%> for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H7979>table,<s%> its <S%H7086>dishes<s%> and its <S%H3709>pans<s%> and its <S%H4518>bowls<s%> and its <S%H7184>jars,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> to <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H5258>libations,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work,<s%> its <S%H3409>base<s%> and its <S%H7070>shaft;<s%> its <S%H1375>cups,<s%> its <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers<s%> were [of one piece] with it.

And there were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of its <S%H6654>sides;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> from the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> of it, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> from the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> of it;

<S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms,] a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms,] a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%> – <S%H3651>so<s%> for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>

And in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> [there were] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> <S%H8246>shaped<s%> <S%H8246>like<s%> <S%H8246>almond<s%> [blossoms,] its <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers;<s%>

and a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> the [first] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> <S%H3318>[coming<s%>] out of it, and a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the [second] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> [coming] out of it, and a <S%H3730>bulb<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the [third] <S%H8147>pair<s%> of <S%H7070>branches<s%> [coming] out of it, for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> coming out of the lampstand.

Their <S%H3730>bulbs<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> were [of one piece] with it; the <S%H3605>whole<s%> of it [was] a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H4749>hammered<s%> <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> its <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps<s%> with its <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> and its <S%H4289>trays<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils<s%> from a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood:<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H753>long<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H7341>wide,<s%> <S%H7251>square,<s%> and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high;<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> were [of one piece] with it.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> its <S%H1406>top<s%> and its <S%H7023>sides<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around,<s%> and its <S%H7161>horns;<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> for it <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it <S%H8478>under<s%> its <S%H2213>molding,<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>sides<s%> – on <S%H8147>opposite<s%> <S%H6654>sides<s%> – as <S%H1004>holders<s%> for <S%H905>poles<s%> with <S%H1992>which<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> it.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H2889>pure,<s%> <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>spices,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H7543>perfumer.<s%>
